conversationHistory.content:
Find the website domain for the given private equity firm name. Return just the domain URL (e.g., 'www.example.com'). Use web search to find their official website. Respond with only the domain name.

Inputs:
input: American Discovery Capital

content.text: Let me search for American Discovery Capital's official website.

input.query: American Discovery Capital private equity firm official website

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "URL: https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/
Title: American Discovery Capital: Investment Banking & Financing
Description: American Discovery Capital provides investment banking & private equity services to leading founder-led and family-run companies.


URL: https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/private-equity
Title: Private Equity Services - American Discovery Capital
Description: American Discovery Capital works with leading founder/family-owned and other closely-held businesses in search of private capital and operational expertise.


URL: https://www.americandiscoverycapital.com/about
Title: About Our Firm | American Discovery Capital
Description: We provide advisory services to leading privately owned and publicly-traded companies, including corporate sales, divestitures, mergers, acquisitions, joint ..."
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}
